text: Jisu amasung mahakki tung-inbasingna Jerusalem naksillaklabada, Chorphon11:1 Israel-da houba thao thokpa chorphon makhal ama. Lamdam asida houba chorphon makhal asi natte. Chinggi manakta leiba Bethphage amasung Bethany-da laklammi. Aduga Ibungona tung-inbasinggi maraktagi makhoi anibu mangjounana tharaduna,
